content: this is a great pattern for learning to read charts for color work i include both written and chart directions in the pattern you ll need double pointed needles two colors of yarn and for stitches you only need to know cast on knit purl and how to knit two stitches together you ll want to pick out two contrasting colors in similar dk weight yarn you ll need about 25g ~50-75 yards of your contrast color red and 30-50g 100-150 yards of your main color black i used berroco renew dk weight yarn in the pictured hat getting started cast on using a stretchy cast-on small 108 medium/large 128 using your smaller needle us 2 the pictured hat was cast on using long tail cast on 128 st for the medium/large size next rib knit k2 p2 for 1 5 to 4 inches depending if you want your brim folded or not my hat has 15 stitches for the brim change to your larger needle us 4 and follow the chart or written directions may the force be with you as you knit up this fun rebel beanie heather
